description: SQL statements for DB2 12.1 database operations

GetSchemasStatement.sql: SELECT TRIM(SCHEMANAME) AS SCHEMANAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.SCHEMATA ORDER BY SCHEMANAME
GetSchemasStatement.description: Get all schemas in the database with full details. Returns schema name, owner, creation time, and remarks. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns. Used by ObjectBrowserService.
GetSchemasStatement.returns: List of all schemas with details

GetSchemasCount.description: Count total number of schemas in the database.

GetTablesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, CARD AS ROW_COUNT, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'S', 'G', 'H', 'L', 'N', 'U', 'W') ORDER BY TABNAME
GetTablesForSchema.description: Get all tables in a specific schema. Returns table name, owner, creation time, row count, and remarks. TYPE IN (...) filters for various table types. TRIM() applied to all CHAR columns.
GetTablesForSchema.returns: List of tables in specified schema

GetTablesCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE IN ('T', 'S', 'G', 'H', 'L', 'N', 'U', 'W')
GetTablesCount.description: Count total number of tables in the database.

GetViewsForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) AS VIEWNAME, TRIM(V.DEFINER) AS DEFINER, TRIM(T.REMARKS) AS REMARKS, T.ALTER_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES T JOIN SYSCAT.VIEWS V ON TRIM(T.TABSCHEMA) = TRIM(V.VIEWSCHEMA) AND TRIM(T.TABNAME) = TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) WHERE T.TYPE = 'V' AND TRIM(T.TABSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY V.VIEWNAME
GetViewsForSchema.description: Get all views in a specific schema. CRITICAL: Start from SYSCAT.TABLES and join to SYSCAT.VIEWS. REMARKS comes from TABLES, not VIEWS. Filter by TYPE='V'. TRIM() applied to all CHAR columns for proper join and comparison.
GetViewsForSchema.returns: List of views in specified schema

GetViewsCount.description: Count total number of views in the database.

GetFunctionsForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetFunctionsForSchema.description: Get all functions in a specific schema. ROUTINETYPE='F' for functions. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetFunctionsForSchema.returns: List of functions in specified schema

GetFunctionsCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINETYPE = 'F'
GetFunctionsCount.description: Count total number of functions in the database.

GetProceduresForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetProceduresForSchema.description: Get all stored procedures in a specific schema. ROUTINETYPE='P' for procedures. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetProceduresForSchema.returns: List of procedures in specified schema

GetProceduresCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINETYPE = 'P'
GetProceduresCount.description: Count total number of procedures in the database.

GetPackagesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGNAME) AS PKGNAME, TRIM(BOUNDBY) AS BOUNDBY, TRIM(ISOLATION) AS ISOLATION, LASTUSED, VALID FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY PKGNAME
GetPackagesForSchema.description: Get all DB2 packages in a specific schema. Returns package name, bound by user, isolation level, last used date, and validity status. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetPackagesForSchema.returns: List of packages in specified schema

GetPackagesCount.description: Count total number of packages in the database.

GetPackageStatements.sql: SELECT CAST(X.STMTNO AS VARCHAR(10)) AS STMTNO, CAST(X.SECTNO AS VARCHAR(10)) AS SECTNO, CAST(X.SEQNO AS VARCHAR(10)) AS SEQNO, TRIM(X.TEXT) AS STATEMENT_TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS X JOIN SYSCAT.PACKAGES Z ON TRIM(X.PKGSCHEMA) = TRIM(Z.PKGSCHEMA) AND TRIM(X.PKGNAME) = TRIM(Z.PKGNAME) WHERE TRIM(X.PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(X.PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY X.STMTNO, X.SECTNO, X.SEQNO
GetPackageStatements.description: Get all SQL statements in a DB2 package. CRITICAL: Must join SYSCAT.STATEMENTS to SYSCAT.PACKAGES on both PKGSCHEMA and PKGNAME. Order by STMTNO, SECTNO, SEQNO for proper sequence. TRIM() applied to all CHAR columns for proper join.
GetPackageStatements.returns: List of SQL statements in a package

GetIndexesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UNIQUERULE, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS INDEXTYPE, TRIM(COLNAMES) AS COLNAMES FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(INDSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetIndexesForSchema.description: Get all indexes in a specific schema. Returns index name, table name, uniqueness rule, index type, and column names. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetIndexesForSchema.returns: List of indexes in specified schema

GetIndexesCount.description: Count total number of indexes in the database.

GetTriggersForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TRIGNAME) AS TRIGNAME, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(TRIGTIME) AS TRIGTIME, TRIM(TRIGEVENT) AS TRIGEVENT FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIM(TRIGSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY TRIGNAME
GetTriggersForSchema.description: Get all triggers in a specific schema. Returns trigger name, table name, trigger time (BEFORE/AFTER), and trigger event. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetTriggersForSchema.returns: List of triggers in specified schema

GetTriggersCount.description: Count total number of triggers in the database.

GetSequencesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(SEQNAME) AS SEQNAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) = ? AND SEQTYPE = 'S' ORDER BY SEQNAME
GetSequencesForSchema.description: Get all sequences in a specific schema. SEQTYPE='S' for user-defined sequences. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetSequencesForSchema.returns: List of sequences in specified schema

GetSequencesCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE SEQTYPE = 'S'
GetSequencesCount.description: Count total number of sequences in the database.

GetTableColumnsForTable.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLNAME, COLNO, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS NULLABLE, COALESCE(TRIM(CAST(DEFAULT AS VARCHAR(254))), '-') AS DEFAULT_VALUE, COALESCE(TRIM(REMARKS), '') AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumnsForTable.description: Get all columns for a specific table. Returns column name, position (COLNO), data type, length, scale, nullable flag, default value, and remarks. Ordered by column position. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetTableColumnsForTable.returns: List of columns for specified table

GetPrimaryKeysForTable.sql: SELECT TRIM(KC.COLNAME) AS COLNAME, KC.COLSEQ FROM SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE KC JOIN SYSCAT.TABCONST TC ON TRIM(KC.CONSTNAME) = TRIM(TC.CONSTNAME) AND TRIM(KC.TABSCHEMA) = TRIM(TC.TABSCHEMA) AND TRIM(KC.TABNAME) = TRIM(TC.TABNAME) WHERE TC.TYPE = 'P' AND TRIM(TC.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TC.TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY KC.COLSEQ
GetPrimaryKeysForTable.description: Get primary key columns for a table. Returns column name and sequence. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns for proper join.

GetForeignKeysForTable.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.CONSTNAME) AS FK_NAME, TRIM(R.REFTABSCHEMA) AS REF_SCHEMA, TRIM(R.REFTABNAME) AS REF_TABLE, TRIM(R.FK_COLNAMES) AS FK_COLUMNS, TRIM(R.PK_COLNAMES) AS PK_COLUMNS, TRIM(R.DELETERULE) AS DELETE_RULE, TRIM(R.UPDATERULE) AS UPDATE_RULE FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R WHERE TRIM(R.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(R.TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY R.CONSTNAME
GetForeignKeysForTable.description: Get foreign key constraints for a table. Returns FK name, referenced schema/table, column mappings, and rules. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetIndexesForTable.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UNIQUERULE, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS INDEXTYPE, TRIM(COLNAMES) AS COLNAMES, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetIndexesForTable.description: Get all indexes for a specific table. Returns index name, uniqueness rule, type, columns, and creation time. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

ExecuteUserQuery.description: Execute user-provided SQL query. This is a placeholder for user-written queries in the SQL editor.

GetUDTsForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(METATYPE) AS METATYPE, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.DATATYPES WHERE TRIM(TYPESCHEMA) = ? AND METATYPE IN ('S', 'D') ORDER BY TYPENAME
GetUDTsForSchema.description: Get all user-defined types in a specific schema. METATYPE 'S' = structured type, 'D' = distinct type. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetUDTsForSchema.returns: List of UDTs in specified schema

GetUDTsCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.DATATYPES WHERE METATYPE IN ('S', 'D')
GetUDTsCount.description: Count total number of user-defined types in the database.

GetSynonymsForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS SYNONYM_NAME, TRIM(BASE_TABSCHEMA) AS BASE_SCHEMA, TRIM(BASE_TABNAME) AS BASE_TABLE, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'A' ORDER BY TABNAME
GetSynonymsForSchema.description: Get all synonyms (aliases) in a specific schema. TYPE='A' for aliases/synonyms. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetSynonymsForSchema.returns: List of synonyms in specified schema

GetSynonymsCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'A'
GetSynonymsCount.description: Count total number of synonyms (aliases) in the database.

GetTablespacesStatement.sql: SELECT TRIM(TBSPACE) AS TBSPACE, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(TBSPACETYPE) AS TBSPACETYPE, TRIM(DATATYPE) AS DATATYPE, PAGESIZE, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TABLESPACES ORDER BY TBSPACE
GetTablespacesStatement.description: Get all tablespaces in the database. Returns tablespace name, owner, type, data type, page size, and creation time. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTablespacesCount.description: Count total number of tablespaces in the database.

GetRolesStatement.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROLENAME) AS ROLENAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.ROLES ORDER BY ROLENAME
GetRolesStatement.description: Get all roles in the database. Returns role name, owner, and creation time. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetGroupsStatement.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GROUPNAME FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'G' ORDER BY GROUPNAME
GetGroupsStatement.description: Get all groups with database privileges. GRANTEETYPE='G' indicates a group. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetUsersStatement.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'U' ORDER BY USERNAME
GetUsersStatement.description: Get all users with database privileges. GRANTEETYPE='U' indicates a user. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetUserPrivileges.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME, DBADMAUTH, SECADMAUTH, ACCESSCTRLAUTH, DATAACCESS, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH, NOFENCEAUTH, IMPLSCHEMAAUTH, LOADAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserPrivileges.description: Get database privileges for a specific user. Returns all authority flags (DBADMAUTH, SECADMAUTH, etc). TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetGroupPrivileges.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GROUPNAME, DBADMAUTH, SECADMAUTH, ACCESSCTRLAUTH, DATAACCESS, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH, NOFENCEAUTH, IMPLSCHEMAAUTH, LOADAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupPrivileges.description: Get database privileges for a specific group. Returns all authority flags. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTablePrivileges.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GRANTEE, TRIM(GRANTEETYPE) AS GRANTEETYPE, TRIM(GRANTOR) AS GRANTOR, CONTROLAUTH, ALTERAUTH, DELETEAUTH, INSERTAUTH, SELECTAUTH, UPDATEAUTH, REFAUTH FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY GRANTEE
GetTablePrivileges.description: Get table-level privileges for a specific table. Returns all authority flags for each grantee. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetViewDefinition.sql: SELECT TRIM(V.TEXT) AS VIEW_DEFINITION FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS V WHERE TRIM(V.VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewDefinition.description: Get the SQL definition text for a view. Returns the CREATE VIEW statement text. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetProcedureDefinition.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.TEXT) AS PROCEDURE_DEFINITION FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES R WHERE TRIM(R.ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(R.ROUTINENAME) = ? AND R.ROUTINETYPE = 'P'
GetProcedureDefinition.description: Get the SQL definition text for a stored procedure. Returns the CREATE PROCEDURE statement text. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetFunctionDefinition.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.TEXT) AS FUNCTION_DEFINITION FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES R WHERE TRIM(R.ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(R.ROUTINENAME) = ? AND R.ROUTINETYPE = 'F'
GetFunctionDefinition.description: Get the SQL definition text for a function. Returns the CREATE FUNCTION statement text. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTriggerDefinition.sql: SELECT TRIM(T.TEXT) AS TRIGGER_DEFINITION FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS T WHERE TRIM(T.TRIGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(T.TRIGNAME) = ?
GetTriggerDefinition.description: Get the SQL definition text for a trigger. Returns the CREATE TRIGGER statement text. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetViewColumns_Display.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS ColumnName, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DataType, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Nullable FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetViewColumns_Display.description: Get columns for a view with display-friendly formatting. Returns column name, data type, and nullable status.

GetViewDependencies.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(BSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(BNAME) AS DEPENDENCY FROM SYSCAT.VIEWDEP WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewDependencies.description: Get objects that a view depends on (tables, views, etc.).

GetRoutineSource.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = ?
GetRoutineSource.description: Get source code for a procedure or function. ROUTINETYPE: P=Procedure, F=Function.

GetRoutineParameters_Display.sql: SELECT TRIM(PARMNAME) AS PARMNAME, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, CASE WHEN PARM_MODE = 'IN' THEN 'IN' WHEN PARM_MODE = 'OUT' THEN 'OUT' WHEN PARM_MODE = 'INOUT' THEN 'INOUT' ELSE TRIM(PARM_MODE) END AS PARM_MODE, LENGTH FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEPARMS WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? ORDER BY ORDINAL
GetRoutineParameters_Display.description: Get parameters for a routine with display-friendly formatting.

GetRoutineProperties.sql: SELECT TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, PARM_COUNT, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, VALID, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = ?
GetRoutineProperties.description: Get routine properties including language, parameter count, owner, creation time, validity, and remarks.

GetPackageValid.sql: SELECT VALID FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ?
GetPackageValid.description: Check if a package is valid. Returns Y or N.

GetPackageStatements_Preview.sql: SELECT STMTNO, SECTNO, SUBSTR(TRIM(TEXT), 1, 200) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY STMTNO
GetPackageStatements_Preview.description: Get package statements with truncated text for preview display.

GetPackageDependencies.sql: SELECT TRIM(BTYPE) AS BTYPE, TRIM(BSCHEMA) AS BSCHEMA, TRIM(BNAME) AS BNAME FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGEDEP WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY BTYPE, BSCHEMA, BNAME
GetPackageDependencies.description: Get objects that a package depends on.

GetPackageStatementFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? AND STMTNO = ?
GetPackageStatementFull.description: Get full text of a specific package statement by statement number.

GetTablesForSchemaSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'T' ORDER BY TABNAME
GetTablesForSchemaSimple.description: Get table names only for a schema (for autocomplete/lists).

GetAllTablesSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(TABNAME) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'T' ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetAllTablesSimple.description: Get all table names with schema prefix (for autocomplete/lists).

GetSchemasSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(SCHEMANAME) FROM SYSCAT.SCHEMATA ORDER BY SCHEMANAME

GetViewsForSchemaSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(VIEWNAME) FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY VIEWNAME
GetViewsForSchemaSimple.description: Get view names only for a schema (for autocomplete/lists).

GetAllViewsSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(VIEWNAME) FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS ORDER BY VIEWSCHEMA, VIEWNAME
GetAllViewsSimple.description: Get all view names with schema prefix (for autocomplete/lists).

GetProceduresForSchemaSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(PROCNAME) FROM SYSCAT.PROCEDURES WHERE TRIM(PROCSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY PROCNAME
GetProceduresForSchemaSimple.description: Get procedure names only for a schema (for autocomplete/lists).

GetAllProceduresSimple.sql: SELECT TRIM(PROCSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(PROCNAME) FROM SYSCAT.PROCEDURES ORDER BY PROCSCHEMA, PROCNAME
GetAllProceduresSimple.description: Get all procedure names with schema prefix (for autocomplete/lists).

GetViewText.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewText.description: Get view definition text by view name only.

GetTriggerSource.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIM(TRIGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TRIGNAME) = ?

GetPackageStatementsWithText.sql: SELECT STMTNO, TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY STMTNO FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY
GetPackageStatementsWithText.description: Get package statements with full text (limited to 50).

GetTablesInTablespace.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TYPE, CARD AS ROW_COUNT FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TBSPACE) = ? ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetTablesInTablespace.description: Get tables in a specific tablespace. TRIM() applied to TBSPACE for proper matching.

GetIndexesInTablespace.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDSCHEMA) AS INDSCHEMA, TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS INDEXTYPE FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TBSPACE) = ? ORDER BY INDSCHEMA, INDNAME
GetIndexesInTablespace.description: Get indexes in a specific tablespace. Returns index name, table name, and index type. Used by TablespaceDetailsDialog.

GetSequenceInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) AS SEQSCHEMA, TRIM(SEQNAME) AS SEQNAME, START, INCREMENT, MINVALUE, MAXVALUE, CYCLE, CACHE FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(SEQNAME) = ?

GetIndexInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDSCHEMA) AS INDSCHEMA, TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, UNIQUERULE, INDEXTYPE FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(INDSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(INDNAME) = ?

GetIndexColumns.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLNAME, COLSEQ, COLORDER FROM SYSCAT.INDEXCOLUSE WHERE TRIM(INDSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(INDNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLSEQ

GetPackageSqlStatements.sql: SELECT TRIM(z.PKGSCHEMA) AS PKGSCHEMA, TRIM(z.PKGNAME) AS PKGNAME, z.LASTUSED, TRIM(x.TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS x JOIN SYSCAT.PACKAGES z ON x.PKGSCHEMA = z.PKGSCHEMA AND x.PKGNAME = z.PKGNAME WHERE TRIM(z.PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(z.PKGNAME) = ? AND z.LASTUSED > CURRENT DATE - 3 YEARS
GetPackageSqlStatements.description: Get SQL statements from a package. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 680-693). Returns all SQL statements from recently used packages (last 3 years). TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetPackageSqlStatements.returns: List of SQL statements in the package

GetColumnsForTable.sql: SELECT TRIM(X.COLNAME) AS COLNAME, X.COLNO, TRIM(X.TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, X.LENGTH, X.SCALE, TRIM(X.NULLS) AS NULLS, TRIM(X.DEFAULT) AS DEFAULT, TRIM(X.REMARKS) AS REMARKS, X.KEYSEQ, TRIM(X.IDENTITY) AS IDENTITY FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS X JOIN SYSCAT.TABLES Y ON X.TABSCHEMA = Y.TABSCHEMA AND X.TABNAME = Y.TABNAME WHERE TRIM(X.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(X.TABNAME) = ? AND Y.TYPE IN ('T', 'V') ORDER BY X.COLNO
GetColumnsForTable.description: Get all columns for a table or view. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 228-233). Returns column definitions with data types, constraints, and metadata. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetColumnsForTable.returns: List of columns with full metadata

GetPrimaryKeyColumns.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLNAME, COLSEQ FROM SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLSEQ
GetPrimaryKeyColumns.description: Get primary key columns for a table. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 258). Returns column names in order. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetPrimaryKeyColumns.returns: List of primary key columns in order

GetForeignKeysForTable_Full.sql: SELECT TRIM(FK.CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(FK.TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(FK.TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(FK.REFTABSCHEMA) AS REFTABSCHEMA, TRIM(FK.REFTABNAME) AS REFTABNAME, TRIM(FK.FK_COLNAMES) AS FK_COLNAMES, TRIM(FK.PK_COLNAMES) AS PK_COLNAMES, TRIM(FK.DELETERULE) AS DELETERULE, TRIM(FK.UPDATERULE) AS UPDATERULE FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES FK WHERE TRIM(FK.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(FK.TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY FK.CONSTNAME
GetForeignKeysForTable_Full.description: Get foreign keys for a table with full details. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql. Returns FK constraints with referenced table and columns. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetForeignKeysForTable_Full.returns: List of foreign keys with references

GetIndexesForTable_WithColumns.sql: SELECT TRIM(I.INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(I.INDSCHEMA) AS INDSCHEMA, TRIM(I.UNIQUERULE) AS UNIQUERULE, TRIM(I.INDEXTYPE) AS INDEXTYPE, I.COLCOUNT, TRIM(I.COMPRESSION) AS COMPRESSION, I.CREATE_TIME, LISTAGG(TRIM(C.COLNAME) || ' ' || CASE WHEN C.COLORDER = 'A' THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.COLSEQ) AS COLUMNS FROM SYSCAT.INDEXCOLUSE C JOIN SYSCAT.INDEXES I ON C.INDNAME = I.INDNAME AND C.INDSCHEMA = I.INDSCHEMA WHERE TRIM(I.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(I.TABNAME) = ? GROUP BY I.INDNAME, I.INDSCHEMA, I.UNIQUERULE, I.INDEXTYPE, I.COLCOUNT, I.COMPRESSION, I.CREATE_TIME ORDER BY I.INDNAME
GetIndexesForTable_WithColumns.description: Get indexes for a table with individual column details via LISTAGG. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql. Returns index definitions with columns. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetIndexesForTable_WithColumns.returns: List of indexes with column details

GetLockMonitorInfo.sql: SELECT DISTINCT appls.DB_NAME, CASE WHEN PKG.PKGNAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'PACKAGE' WHEN T.TABNAME IS NOT NULL AND T.TYPE = 'T' THEN 'TABLE' WHEN T.TABNAME IS NOT NULL AND T.TYPE = 'V' THEN 'VIEW' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS OBJECT_TYPE, TRIM(l.TABSCHEMA) AS OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME, TRIM(l.TABNAME) AS OBJECT_NAME, TRIM(appls.PRIMARY_AUTH_ID) AS USER_ID, appls.CLIENT_NNAME, appls.APPL_NAME, TRIM(L.LOCK_STATUS) AS LOCK_STATUS, TRIM(L.LOCK_MODE) AS LOCK_MODE, L.AGENT_ID FROM SYSIBMADM.SNAPAPPL_INFO AS APPLS JOIN SYSIBMADM.SNAPLOCK L ON APPLS.AGENT_ID = L.AGENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSCAT.PACKAGES PKG ON TRIM(L.TABSCHEMA) = TRIM(PKG.PKGSCHEMA) AND TRIM(L.TABNAME) = TRIM(PKG.PKGNAME) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSCAT.TABLES T ON TRIM(L.TABSCHEMA) = TRIM(T.TABSCHEMA) AND TRIM(L.TABNAME) = TRIM(T.TABNAME) WHERE L.TABNAME <> ''
GetLockMonitorInfo.description: Get lock monitoring information. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 71-125). Returns all active locks with object type, user, and application details. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetLockMonitorInfo.returns: List of active locks with details

GetRunstatsCommand.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, STATS_TIME, 'CALL SYSPROC.ADMIN_CMD(''RUNSTATS ON TABLE ' || TRIM(TABSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(TABNAME) || ' WITH DISTRIBUTION AND DETAILED INDEXES ALL'');' AS RUNSTATS_COMMAND FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'T'
GetRunstatsCommand.description: Generate RUNSTATS command for tables. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 149-158). Returns executable RUNSTATS command. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableDependencies.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS DEPENDENCY_SCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS DEPENDENCY_TABLE, TRIM(DTYPE) AS DEPENDENCY_TYPE, TRIM(BTYPE) AS REFERENCE_TYPE, TRIM(BSCHEMA) AS REFERENCE_SCHEMA, TRIM(BNAME) AS REFERENCE_OBJECT FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? OR TRIM(BSCHEMA) = ?
GetTableDependencies.description: Get table dependencies. PROVEN PATTERN from Db2CreateDBQA_NonRelated.sql (Line 632-649). Shows which objects depend on a table and which objects the table depends on. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableStatistics.sql: SELECT CARD AS RowCount, NPAGES AS NumberOfPages, FPAGES AS FormattedPages, OVERFLOW AS OverflowPages, STATS_TIME AS LastStatsTime, TRIM(COMPRESSION) AS Compression, TRIM(TABLEORG) AS TableOrganization, AVGROWSIZE AS AvgRowSize FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?
GetTableStatistics.description: Get table statistics. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 109-122). Returns cardinality, page counts, statistics time, and storage properties. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableColumnDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS ColumnName, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DataType, LENGTH, SCALE, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Nullable, COALESCE(TRIM(DEFAULT), '-') AS DefaultValue, COALESCE(TRIM(REMARKS), '') AS Remarks, COLNO AS Position, KEYSEQ, TRIM(IDENTITY) AS IsIdentity, TRIM(GENERATED) AS Generated FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumnDetailed.description: Get detailed table columns. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 16-28). Returns all column metadata including data type, nullability, defaults, and remarks. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetPrimaryKeyDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(K.CONSTNAME) AS ConstraintName, TRIM(K.COLNAME) AS ColumnName, K.COLSEQ AS Position FROM SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE K WHERE TRIM(K.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(K.TABNAME) = ? AND K.CONSTNAME IN (SELECT CONSTNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABCONST WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? AND TYPE = 'P') ORDER BY K.COLSEQ
GetPrimaryKeyDetailed.description: Get primary key with details. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 37-56). Returns constraint name and columns in order. Uses TABCONST to verify PK type. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetForeignKeysDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.CONSTNAME) AS FKName, TRIM(R.REFTABSCHEMA) AS RefSchema, TRIM(R.REFTABNAME) AS RefTable, TRIM(K.COLNAME) AS ColumnName, K.COLSEQ AS Position, TRIM(R.DELETERULE) AS DeleteRule, TRIM(R.UPDATERULE) AS UpdateRule FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE K ON TRIM(R.CONSTNAME) = TRIM(K.CONSTNAME) AND TRIM(R.TABSCHEMA) = TRIM(K.TABSCHEMA) AND TRIM(R.TABNAME) = TRIM(K.TABNAME) WHERE TRIM(R.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(R.TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY R.CONSTNAME, K.COLSEQ
GetForeignKeysDetailed.description: Get foreign keys with details. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 61-85). Returns FK constraints with referenced tables, columns, and rules. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetForeignKeysDetailed.returns: Foreign keys with references and rules

GetTableIndexesDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS IndexName, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UniqueRule, TRIM(COLNAMES) AS Columns, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS IndexType, TRIM(REMARKS) AS Remarks, COLCOUNT AS ColumnCount, UNIQUECOLCOUNT AS UniqueColumnCount, CREATE_TIME AS CreatedDate, TRIM(COMPRESSION) AS Compression FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetTableIndexesDetailed.description: Get table indexes with details. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 90-104). Returns index metadata including uniqueness, type, and column list. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetPackageProperties.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) AS PackageSchema, TRIM(PKGNAME) AS PackageName, TRIM(BOUNDBY) AS BoundBy, TRIM(DEFINER) AS Definer, LASTUSED AS LastUsed, CREATE_TIME AS CreatedDate, VALID AS IsValid, TRIM(ISOLATION) AS IsolationLevel, TRIM(BLOCKING) AS Blocking, TRIM(SQLWARN) AS SqlWarnings, TRIM(FUNCPATH) AS FunctionPath, TRIM(REMARKS) AS Remarks FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ?
GetPackageProperties.description: Get package properties. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md (Line 150-165). Returns comprehensive package metadata including binding info, last used date, and settings. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetUserDetails.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS Username, DBADMAUTH, SECADMAUTH, ACCESSCTRLAUTH, DATAACCESS AS DATAACCESSAUTH, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH, NOFENCEAUTH, IMPLSCHEMAAUTH, LOADAUTH, QUIESCECONNECTAUTH, SQLADMAUTH, WLMADMAUTH, EXPLAINAUTH, CREATESECUREAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserDetails.description: Get user database authorities. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md. Returns all database-level authorities for a user. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetGroupDetails.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS Groupname, DBADMAUTH, SECADMAUTH, ACCESSCTRLAUTH, DATAACCESS AS DATAACCESSAUTH, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH, NOFENCEAUTH, IMPLSCHEMAAUTH, LOADAUTH, QUIESCECONNECTAUTH, SQLADMAUTH, WLMADMAUTH, EXPLAINAUTH, CREATESECUREAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupDetails.description: Get group database authorities. PROVEN PATTERN from PROPERTY_DIALOGS_SQL_QUERIES.md. Returns all database-level authorities for a group. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTablespacesDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(TBSPACE) AS TablespaceName, TRIM(OWNER) AS Owner, TRIM(TBSPACETYPE) AS TablespaceType, TRIM(DATATYPE) AS DataType, PAGESIZE AS PageSize, CREATE_TIME AS CreatedDate, TRIM(TBSPACEID) AS TablespaceId, TRIM(NGNAME) AS NodegroupName, TRIM(BUFFERPOOLID) AS BufferpoolId FROM SYSCAT.TABLESPACES ORDER BY TBSPACE
GetTablespacesDetailed.description: Get detailed tablespace information. Returns comprehensive tablespace metadata. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetSequencesForSchema_Full.sql: SELECT TRIM(SEQNAME) AS SequenceName, TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) AS SequenceSchema, TRIM(OWNER) AS Owner, START AS StartValue, INCREMENT AS IncrementBy, MAXVALUE AS MaxValue, MINVALUE AS MinValue, CYCLE AS IsCycle, CACHE AS CacheSize, CREATE_TIME AS CreatedDate FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) = ? AND SEQTYPE = 'S' ORDER BY SEQNAME
GetSequencesForSchema_Full.description: Get user sequences in a schema with full details. SEQTYPE='S' filters for user sequences only. Returns sequence metadata including start, increment, min/max values, and cache settings. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.
GetSequencesForSchema_Full.returns: List of sequences with full metadata

GetVariablesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(VARNAME) AS VariableName, TRIM(VARSCHEMA) AS VariableSchema, TRIM(OWNER) AS Owner, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DataType, LENGTH AS Length, SCALE AS Scale, TRIM(REMARKS) AS Remarks, CREATE_TIME AS CreatedDate FROM SYSCAT.VARIABLES WHERE TRIM(VARSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY VARNAME
GetVariablesForSchema.description: Get global variables in a schema. Returns variable metadata including data type and length. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetUserAuthorities.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME, DBADMAUTH, SECURITYADMAUTH AS SECADMAUTH, ACCESSCTRLAUTH, DATAACCESS AS DATAACCESSAUTH, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH, NOFENCEAUTH, IMPLSCHEMAAUTH, LOADAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ?
GetUserAuthorities.description: Get user database authorities for access control. Used by AccessControlService to determine user access level. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetGroupsCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GRANTEE) FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupsCount.description: Count total groups with database privileges.

GetUsersCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GRANTEE) FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUsersCount.description: Count total users with database privileges.

GetTablesCount_BaseOnly.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'T'
GetTablesCount_BaseOnly.description: Count total base tables only (TYPE='T'). Excludes MQTs, GTTs, nicknames, etc.

GetIndexesForSchemaDetailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UNIQUERULE, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS INDEXTYPE, TRIM(COLNAMES) AS COLNAMES, COLCOUNT, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(INDSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetIndexesForSchemaDetailed.description: Get all indexes in a schema with details. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetModulesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(MODULENAME) AS MODULENAME, TRIM(MODULESCHEMA) AS MODULESCHEMA, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.MODULES WHERE TRIM(MODULESCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY MODULENAME
GetModulesForSchema.description: Get all modules in a schema. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetXmlSchemasForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(OBJECTSCHEMA) AS OBJECTSCHEMA, TRIM(OBJECTNAME) AS OBJECTNAME, TRIM(TARGETNAMESPACE) AS TARGETNAMESPACE, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.XSROBJECTS WHERE TRIM(OBJECTSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY OBJECTNAME
GetXmlSchemasForSchema.description: Get XML schemas in a schema. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetAliasesForSchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS ALIASNAME, TRIM(BASE_TABSCHEMA) AS BASE_SCHEMA, TRIM(BASE_TABNAME) AS BASE_TABLE, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'A' ORDER BY TABNAME
GetAliasesForSchema.description: Get all aliases in a schema. TYPE='A' indicates alias. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetBufferpools.sql: SELECT TRIM(BPNAME) AS BPNAME, NPAGES, PAGESIZE, BUFFERPOOLID, TRIM(NGNAME) AS NGNAME FROM SYSCAT.BUFFERPOOLS ORDER BY BPNAME
GetBufferpools.description: Get all bufferpools. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetStorageGroups.sql: SELECT TRIM(SGNAME) AS SGNAME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(OVERHEAD) AS OVERHEAD, TRIM(DEVICEREADRATE) AS DEVICEREADRATE FROM SYSCAT.STOGROUPS ORDER BY SGNAME
GetStorageGroups.description: Get all storage groups. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableConstraints.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(TYPE) AS TYPE, TRIM(ENFORCED) AS ENFORCED, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TABCONST WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY CONSTNAME
GetTableConstraints.description: Get all constraints for a table. Types: P=Primary Key, F=Foreign Key, U=Unique, K=Check. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableCheckConstraints.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(TEXT) AS CHECK_CLAUSE, TRIM(ENFORCED) AS ENFORCED FROM SYSCAT.CHECKS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY CONSTNAME
GetTableCheckConstraints.description: Get check constraints for a table. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetRoutineParameters.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS ROUTINESCHEMA, TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(PARMNAME) AS PARMNAME, ORDINAL, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, TRIM(ROWTYPE) AS ROWTYPE FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEPARMS WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? ORDER BY ORDINAL
GetRoutineParameters.description: Get parameters for a stored procedure or function. ROWTYPE: P=Parameter, R=Return, C=Column. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetEventMonitors.sql: SELECT TRIM(EVMONNAME) AS EVMONNAME, TRIM(TARGET_TYPE) AS TARGET_TYPE, TRIM(AUTOSTART) AS AUTOSTART, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.EVENTMONITORS ORDER BY EVMONNAME
GetEventMonitors.description: Get all event monitors. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetWorkloads.sql: SELECT TRIM(WORKLOADNAME) AS WORKLOADNAME, WORKLOADID, TRIM(ENABLED) AS ENABLED, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.WORKLOADS ORDER BY WORKLOADNAME
GetWorkloads.description: Get all workloads for workload management. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetServiceClasses.sql: SELECT TRIM(SERVICECLASSNAME) AS SERVICECLASSNAME, SERVICECLASSID, TRIM(ENABLED) AS ENABLED, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.SERVICECLASSES ORDER BY SERVICECLASSNAME
GetServiceClasses.description: Get all service classes for workload management. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTrustedContexts.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONTEXTNAME) AS CONTEXTNAME, TRIM(SYSTEM_AUTHID) AS SYSTEM_AUTHID, TRIM(ENABLED) AS ENABLED, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.CONTEXTS ORDER BY CONTEXTNAME
GetTrustedContexts.description: Get all trusted contexts. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetNicknames.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS NICKNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS SCHEMA, TRIM(SERVERNAME) AS SERVER, TRIM(REMOTE_TABNAME) AS REMOTE_TABLE, TRIM(REMOTE_SCHEMA) AS REMOTE_SCHEMA FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'N' ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetNicknames.description: Get all nicknames for federated databases. TYPE='N' indicates nickname. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetServers.sql: SELECT TRIM(SERVERNAME) AS SERVERNAME, TRIM(SERVERTYPE) AS SERVERTYPE, TRIM(SERVERVERSION) AS SERVERVERSION, TRIM(WRAPPER) AS WRAPPER, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.SERVERS ORDER BY SERVERNAME
GetServers.description: Get all remote servers for federated databases. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetWrappers.sql: SELECT TRIM(WRAPNAME) AS WRAPNAME, TRIM(WRAPTYPE) AS WRAPTYPE, TRIM(WRAPVERSION) AS WRAPVERSION, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.WRAPPERS ORDER BY WRAPNAME
GetWrappers.description: Get all wrappers for federated databases. TRIM() applied to CHAR columns.

GetTableColumns_Display.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS ColumnName, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DataType, LENGTH, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Nullable, COALESCE(TRIM(DEFAULT), '-') AS DefaultValue, COALESCE(TRIM(REMARKS), '') AS Remarks FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumns_Display.description: Get all columns for a table with full metadata. Returns column name, data type, length, nullable status (Yes/No), default value, and remarks. Used by TableDetailsDialog Tab 1 (Columns).
GetTableColumns_Display.returns: List of columns with display-friendly metadata

GetTableForeignKeys_Detailed.sql: SELECT TRIM(FK.CONSTNAME) AS FKName, TRIM(FK.COLNAME) AS FKColumn, TRIM(PK.TABSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(PK.TABNAME) AS PKTable, TRIM(PK.COLNAME) AS PKColumn, TRIM(R.DELETERULE) AS DeleteRule, TRIM(R.UPDATERULE) AS UpdateRule FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE FK ON R.CONSTNAME = FK.CONSTNAME AND R.TABSCHEMA = FK.TABSCHEMA AND R.TABNAME = FK.TABNAME JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE PK ON R.REFKEYNAME = PK.CONSTNAME AND R.REFTABSCHEMA = PK.TABSCHEMA AND R.REFTABNAME = PK.TABNAME AND FK.COLSEQ = PK.COLSEQ WHERE TRIM(R.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(R.TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY FK.CONSTNAME, FK.COLSEQ
GetTableForeignKeys_Detailed.description: Get all outgoing foreign keys for a table. Joins REFERENCES with KEYCOLUSE to get FK constraint names, source columns, referenced tables/columns, and rules. Used by TableDetailsDialog Tab 2 (Foreign Keys).
GetTableForeignKeys_Detailed.returns: List of foreign keys with full constraint details

GetTableIndexes_Aggregated.sql: SELECT TRIM(I.INDNAME) AS IndexName, CASE WHEN I.INDEXTYPE = 'CLUS' THEN 'Clustered' WHEN I.INDEXTYPE = 'REG' THEN 'Regular' WHEN I.INDEXTYPE = 'DIM' THEN 'Dimension' ELSE I.INDEXTYPE END AS IndexType, CASE WHEN I.UNIQUERULE = 'U' THEN 'Yes' WHEN I.UNIQUERULE = 'P' THEN 'Primary Key' ELSE 'No' END AS IsUnique, LISTAGG(TRIM(IC.COLNAME), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY IC.COLSEQ) AS Columns FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES I LEFT JOIN SYSCAT.INDEXCOLUSE IC ON I.INDSCHEMA = IC.INDSCHEMA AND I.INDNAME = IC.INDNAME WHERE TRIM(I.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(I.TABNAME) = ? GROUP BY I.INDNAME, I.INDEXTYPE, I.UNIQUERULE ORDER BY I.INDNAME
GetTableIndexes_Aggregated.description: Get all indexes for a table with aggregated column lists. Uses LISTAGG to concatenate column names. Returns index name, type (user-friendly labels), uniqueness status, and comma-separated columns. Used by TableDetailsDialog Tab 3 (Indexes).
GetTableIndexes_Aggregated.returns: List of indexes with column lists

GetTableBasicInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(TYPE) AS TableType, TRIM(TBSPACE) AS Tablespace FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?
GetTableBasicInfo.description: Get basic table information - table type and tablespace. Used by TableDetailsDialog Tab 4 (Statistics) to display table type and tablespace name.

GetTableDdlColumns.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLNAME, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, TRIM(NULLS) AS NULLS, TRIM(DEFAULT) AS DEFAULT FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableDdlColumns.description: Get column information for DDL generation. Returns column name, type, length, scale, nullable flag (Y/N), and default value. Used by TableDetailsDialog Tab 5 (DDL) to generate CREATE TABLE statements. CRITICAL: Must alias all TRIM() columns to preserve original column names.

GetAllSelectableTables.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TABSCHEMA, TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'T' AND (TABSCHEMA = ? OR TABSCHEMA NOT LIKE 'SYS%') ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetAllSelectableTables.description: Get all user tables for schema/table selection dialog. Filters to TYPE='T' (tables only) and excludes system schemas (SYS%). Used by SchemaTableSelectionDialog to build tree view of selectable tables.
GetAllSelectableTables.returns: List of schemas and tables for selection

GetTableColumns_Basic.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME), TRIM(TYPENAME), LENGTH, SCALE, TRIM(NULLS), TRIM(DEFAULT), TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumns_Basic.description: Get basic column information for a table. Returns column name, type, length, scale, nullable flag, default value, and remarks. Used by DB2ConnectionManager for internal operations.

GetTableColumns_All.sql: SELECT * FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABNAME = ? AND TABSCHEMA = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumns_All.description: Get all column metadata for a specific schema.table. Used by DB2MetadataService for structure analysis.

GetTableIndexes_All.sql: SELECT * FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TABNAME = ? AND TABSCHEMA = ?
GetTableIndexes_All.description: Get all index metadata for a specific schema.table. Used by DB2MetadataService for structure analysis.

GetAllTablesAndViews.sql: SELECT TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, TYPE FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE IN ('T', 'V')
GetAllTablesAndViews.description: Get all user tables and views for metadata loading. Returns schema, table name, and type (T=table, V=view).

GetTablesForSchema_MetadataLoader.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TYPE FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'T' ORDER BY TABNAME
GetTablesForSchema_MetadataLoader.description: Get all tables in a specific schema for metadata loading. Returns schema, table name, and type (T=table). TRIM() applied.

GetColumnMetadataForTable.sql: SELECT COLNAME, TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, NULLS, DEFAULT, REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetColumnMetadataForTable.description: Get column metadata for a specific table used in metadata loading. Similar to SERVICE_GetTableColumnsAll but with specific columns.

GetPackageList.sql: SELECT PKGSCHEMA, PKGNAME, LASTUSED, DEFINER FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE PKGSCHEMA = ? ORDER BY PKGNAME
GetPackageList.description: Get all packages in a schema. Returns package schema, name, last used timestamp, and definer.

GetPackageStatements_Simple.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY STMTNO
GetPackageStatements_Simple.description: Get all SQL statement texts from a package. Returns statement text for all statements in package, ordered by statement number. TRIM() applied.

GetProceduresSourceCode.sql: SELECT ROUTINETYPE AS OBJECT_TYPE, ROUTINESCHEMA AS SCHEMA, ROUTINENAME AS NAME, TEXT AS SOURCE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_REGEN_TIME, LANGUAGE FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetProceduresSourceCode.description: Get source code for all procedures in a schema. Filters ROUTINETYPE='P'. Returns type, schema, name, source code, timestamps, and language.

GetFunctionsSourceCode.sql: SELECT ROUTINETYPE AS OBJECT_TYPE, ROUTINESCHEMA AS SCHEMA, ROUTINENAME AS NAME, TEXT AS SOURCE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_REGEN_TIME, LANGUAGE FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetFunctionsSourceCode.description: Get source code for all functions in a schema. Filters ROUTINETYPE='F'. Returns type, schema, name, source code, timestamps, and language.

GetViewSourceCode.sql: SELECT 'VIEW' AS OBJECT_TYPE, VIEWSCHEMA AS SCHEMA, VIEWNAME AS NAME, TEXT AS SOURCE_CODE, CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) AS CREATE_TIME, CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) AS LAST_REGEN_TIME, CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1)) AS LANGUAGE FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE VIEWSCHEMA = ? ORDER BY VIEWNAME
GetViewSourceCode.description: Get source code for all views in a schema. Returns object type (VIEW), schema, name, SQL definition, and NULL timestamps/language for consistency.

GetTriggerSourceCode.sql: SELECT 'TRIGGER' AS OBJECT_TYPE, TRIGSCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TRIGNAME AS NAME, TEXT AS SOURCE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_REGEN_TIME, CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1)) AS LANGUAGE FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY TRIGNAME
GetTriggerSourceCode.description: Get source code for all triggers on a specific table. Returns object type (TRIGGER), schema, name, source code, timestamps, and NULL language.

GetIncomingForeignKeys.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS REFERENCING_SCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS REFERENCING_TABLE, TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(FK_COLNAMES) AS FK_COLNAMES, TRIM(PK_COLNAMES) AS PK_COLNAMES, TRIM(DELETERULE) AS DELETERULE, TRIM(UPDATERULE) AS UPDATERULE FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES WHERE TRIM(REFTABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(REFTABNAME) = ? ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetIncomingForeignKeys.description: Get all incoming foreign keys (tables that reference this table). Returns referencing schema/table, constraint name, column names, and rules. TRIM() applied to all CHAR columns for consistent matching.
GetIncomingForeignKeys.returns: Incoming foreign keys with full details

GetReferencingPackages.sql: SELECT DISTINCT 'PACKAGE' AS OBJECT_TYPE, d.TABSCHEMA AS SCHEMA, d.TABNAME AS NAME, p.LASTUSED FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP d JOIN SYSCAT.PACKAGES p ON d.TABSCHEMA = p.PKGSCHEMA AND d.TABNAME = p.PKGNAME WHERE d.BSCHEMA = ? AND d.BNAME = ? AND d.DTYPE = 'O' ORDER BY d.TABSCHEMA, d.TABNAME
GetReferencingPackages.description: Get all packages that reference a specific table via TABDEP join. Returns object type (PACKAGE), schema, name, and last used timestamp.

GetReferencingViews.sql: SELECT DISTINCT 'VIEW' AS OBJECT_TYPE, TABSCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TABNAME AS NAME, CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) AS LASTUSED FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP WHERE BSCHEMA = ? AND BNAME = ? AND DTYPE = 'V' ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetReferencingViews.description: Get all views that reference a specific table via TABDEP. Returns object type (VIEW), schema, name, and NULL timestamp.

GetReferencingRoutines.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN DTYPE = 'P' THEN 'PROCEDURE' WHEN DTYPE = 'F' THEN 'FUNCTION' ELSE DTYPE END AS OBJECT_TYPE, TABSCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TABNAME AS NAME, CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) AS LASTUSED FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP WHERE BSCHEMA = ? AND BNAME = ? AND DTYPE IN ('P', 'F') ORDER BY OBJECT_TYPE, SCHEMA, NAME
GetReferencingRoutines.description: Get all routines (functions, procedures) that reference a specific table via TABDEP. Returns object type (FUNCTION/PROCEDURE), schema, name, and NULL timestamp.

GetTriggerInfo.sql: SELECT TRIGNAME, TRIGSCHEMA, TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, TRIGTIME, TRIGEVENT, GRANULARITY, ENABLED, VALID, REMARKS, TEXT, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIGSCHEMA = ? AND TRIGNAME = ?
GetTriggerInfo.description: Get detailed information about a specific trigger. Returns trigger metadata, target table, timing, event, body text, and creation time. Used by CLI command 'trigger-info'.

GetViewInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) AS VIEWNAME, TRIM(V.VIEWSCHEMA) AS VIEWSCHEMA, TRIM(V.DEFINER) AS DEFINER, TRIM(V.VALID) AS VALID, TRIM(V.READONLY) AS READONLY, TRIM(T.REMARKS) AS REMARKS, T.CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS V JOIN SYSCAT.TABLES T ON V.VIEWSCHEMA = T.TABSCHEMA AND V.VIEWNAME = T.TABNAME WHERE TRIM(V.VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewInfo.description: Get detailed information about a specific view. SYSCAT.VIEWS does NOT have TEXT or VIEWCHECK columns. Returns view metadata, definer, validity, and remarks from joined SYSCAT.TABLES. Used by CLI command 'view-info'.

GetProcedureInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS ROUTINESCHEMA, TRIM(DEFINER) AS DEFINER, TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, TRIM(DETERMINISTIC) AS DETERMINISTIC, TRIM(ORIGIN) AS ORIGIN, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P'
GetProcedureInfo.description: Get detailed information about a specific stored procedure. SYSCAT.ROUTINES does NOT have EXTERNAL_ACTION, NULL_CALL, REMARKS, or TEXT columns in DB2 12.1. Returns procedure metadata, language, deterministic flag, origin, and creation time. ROUTINETYPE='P' for procedures. Used by CLI command 'procedure-info'.

GetFunctionInfo.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS ROUTINESCHEMA, TRIM(DEFINER) AS DEFINER, TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, TRIM(DETERMINISTIC) AS DETERMINISTIC, TRIM(ORIGIN) AS ORIGIN, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F'
GetFunctionInfo.description: Get detailed information about a specific function. SYSCAT.ROUTINES does NOT have EXTERNAL_ACTION, NULL_CALL, REMARKS, TEXT, TYPESCHEMA, or TYPENAME columns in DB2 12.1. Returns function metadata, language, deterministic flag, origin, and creation time. ROUTINETYPE='F' for functions. Used by CLI command 'function-info'.

GetDatabaseSize.sql: SELECT SUM(CARD) AS TotalRows, SUM(NPAGES) AS TotalPages, SUM(NPAGES) * 4 / 1024.0 AS TotalSizeMB FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE IN ('T', 'U') AND TABSCHEMA NOT IN ('SYSIBM', 'SYSCAT', 'SYSPROC', 'SYSFUN')
GetDatabaseSize.description: Calculate approximate database size by summing table pages. Excludes system schemas. Returns total rows, pages, and size in MB. 4KB page size assumed. Used by CLI command 'database-size'.

GetTableSize.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, CARD AS RowCount, NPAGES AS DataPages, FPAGES AS IndexPages, OVERFLOW AS OverflowPages, (NPAGES + FPAGES + OVERFLOW) * 4 / 1024.0 AS TotalSizeMB FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?
GetTableSize.description: Get size information for a specific table. Returns row count, data pages, index pages, overflow pages, and total size in MB. Used by CLI command 'table-size'.

GetSchemaSize.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, COUNT(*) AS TableCount, SUM(CARD) AS TotalRows, SUM(NPAGES) AS TotalDataPages, SUM(FPAGES) AS TotalIndexPages, SUM(NPAGES + FPAGES) * 4 / 1024.0 AS TotalSizeMB FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'U') GROUP BY TABSCHEMA
GetSchemaSize.description: Get size information for all tables in a schema. Returns table count, total rows, total data pages, total index pages, and total size in MB. Only includes user tables (T, U). Used by CLI command 'schema-size'.

GetTableColumns.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS ColumnName, COLNO AS OrdinalPosition, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DataType, LENGTH, SCALE, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsNullable, COALESCE(TRIM(DEFAULT), '') AS DefaultValue, COALESCE(TRIM(REMARKS), '') AS Comment, CASE WHEN IDENTITY = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsIdentity FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumns.description: Get all columns for a table with CLI-specific column names and boolean flags as 0/1. Used by CLI command 'table-columns'.

GetTableForeignKeys.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS FKName, FK_COLNAMES AS FKColumns, TRIM(REFTABSCHEMA) AS RefSchema, TRIM(REFTABNAME) AS RefTable, PK_COLNAMES AS RefColumns, TRIM(DELETERULE) AS DeleteRule, TRIM(UPDATERULE) AS UpdateRule FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY CONSTNAME
GetTableForeignKeys.description: Get all outgoing foreign keys for a table with CLI-specific column structure (separate schema/table, column lists as strings). Used by CLI command 'table-foreign-keys'.

GetTableIndexes.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS IndexName, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS IndexType, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UniqueRule, COLNAMES, COLCOUNT, TRIM(REVERSE_SCANS) AS ReverseScans, FIRSTKEYCARD, FULLKEYCARD, TRIM(REMARKS) AS IndexComment FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetTableIndexes.description: Get all indexes for a table with detailed CLI-specific metadata including cardinality and scan direction. Used by CLI command 'table-indexes'.
GetTableIndexes.returns: List of indexes with full metadata

GetTableStatistics_Full.sql: SELECT CARD AS RowCount, NPAGES AS DataPages, FPAGES AS IndexPages, OVERFLOW AS OverflowPages, AVGROWSIZE AS AvgRowSize, STATS_TIME AS LastStatsTime, TRIM(COMPRESSION) AS Compression, TRIM(TABLEORG) AS TableOrganization, PCTFREE AS PercentFree FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ?
GetTableStatistics_Full.description: Get comprehensive table statistics including compression and organization. Extended version for CLI command 'table-statistics-full'.

GetTableIncomingForeignKeys.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.TABSCHEMA) AS RefBySchema, TRIM(R.TABNAME) AS RefByTable, TRIM(R.CONSTNAME) AS FKName, R.FK_COLNAMES AS FKColumns, R.PK_COLNAMES AS PKColumns, TRIM(R.DELETERULE) AS DeleteRule FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R WHERE R.REFTABSCHEMA = ? AND R.REFTABNAME = ? ORDER BY R.TABSCHEMA, R.TABNAME
GetTableIncomingForeignKeys.description: Get all incoming foreign keys (tables that reference this table). Used by CLI command 'table-incoming-fks'.
GetTableIncomingForeignKeys.returns: List of tables referencing this table

GetActiveSessions_Full.sql: SELECT AGENT_ID, APPL_NAME, AUTHID, CLIENT_NNAME, NUM_ASSOC_AGENTS, COORD_AGENT_PID FROM SYSIBMADM.SNAPAPPL_INFO ORDER BY AGENT_ID DESC
GetActiveSessions_Full.description: Get all active sessions with full details from DB2 monitoring views. Note: AGENT_STATE_LAST_UPDATE_TIME is not available in all DB2 versions. Used by CLI command 'active-sessions-full'.
GetActiveSessions_Full.returns: List of active sessions with detailed metrics

GetLockChains.sql: SELECT L.AGENT_ID, L.TABSCHEMA, L.TABNAME, L.LOCK_MODE, L.LOCK_STATUS, A.APPL_NAME, A.AUTHID FROM SYSIBMADM.SNAPLOCK L JOIN SYSIBMADM.SNAPAPPL_INFO A ON L.AGENT_ID = A.AGENT_ID WHERE L.LOCK_STATUS = 'W' ORDER BY L.AGENT_ID
GetLockChains.description: Get lock chains showing waiting locks and their associated applications. Useful for deadlock analysis. Used by CLI command 'lock-chains'.
GetLockChains.returns: List of waiting locks with application context

GetTableActivity.sql: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, ROWS_READ, ROWS_INSERTED, ROWS_UPDATED, ROWS_DELETED, TABLE_SCANS, OBJECT_DATA_L_READS, OBJECT_DATA_P_READS FROM TABLE(MON_GET_TABLE('', '', -2)) AS T WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA NOT IN ('SYSIBM', 'SYSCAT', 'SYSPROC', 'SYSFUN') ORDER BY (ROWS_READ + ROWS_INSERTED + ROWS_UPDATED + ROWS_DELETED) DESC FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY
GetTableActivity.description: Get table activity metrics using MON_GET_TABLE function. Shows read/write activity for top 100 active tables. Excludes system schemas. Used by CLI command 'table-activity'.

GetTopActiveTables.sql: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, ROWS_READ, ROWS_INSERTED, ROWS_UPDATED, ROWS_DELETED, (ROWS_READ + ROWS_INSERTED + ROWS_UPDATED + ROWS_DELETED) AS TOTAL_OPERATIONS FROM TABLE(MON_GET_TABLE('', '', -2)) AS T WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA NOT IN ('SYSIBM', 'SYSCAT', 'SYSPROC', 'SYSFUN') ORDER BY TOTAL_OPERATIONS DESC FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY
GetTopActiveTables.description: Get top 50 most active tables by total operations (reads + writes). Uses MON_GET_TABLE monitoring function. Used by CLI command 'top-active-tables'.
GetTopActiveTables.returns: Top 50 active tables ranked by activity

GetTableGrants.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTOR) AS Grantor, TRIM(GRANTEE) AS Grantee, TRIM(GRANTEETYPE) AS GranteeType, CONTROLAUTH, ALTERAUTH, DELETEAUTH, INDEXAUTH, INSERTAUTH, REFAUTH, SELECTAUTH, UPDATEAUTH FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ?
GetTableGrants.description: Get all grants/privileges for a specific table. Returns grantor, grantee, and specific privilege flags. Used by CLI command 'table-grants'.
GetTableGrants.returns: List of grants with privilege details

GetActiveSessions.sql: SELECT CURRENT USER AS AUTHID, CURRENT TIMESTAMP AS CONNECT_TIME FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
GetActiveSessions.description: Get active database sessions. Returns current user and connect time. Note: Full session monitoring requires admin views. Used by CLI command 'active-sessions'.
GetActiveSessions.returns: List of active sessions (limited info without admin privileges)

GetDatabaseLoad.sql: SELECT TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, ROWS_READ, ROWS_INSERTED, ROWS_UPDATED, ROWS_DELETED FROM TABLE(MON_GET_TABLE('', '', -2)) AS T WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? ORDER BY (ROWS_READ + ROWS_INSERTED + ROWS_UPDATED + ROWS_DELETED) DESC
GetDatabaseLoad.description: Get database load metrics by table. Uses MON_GET_TABLE monitoring function to retrieve read/write statistics. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'database-load'.
GetDatabaseLoad.returns: Table load metrics with row operation counts

GetDatabaseLoadMonitor.sql: SELECT t.tabschema AS SchemaName, t.tabname AS TableName, COALESCE(TRIM(s.tbspace), '') AS TablespaceName, SUM(t.rows_read) AS TotalRowsRead, SUM(t.rows_inserted) AS TotalRowsInserted, SUM(t.rows_updated) AS TotalRowsUpdated, SUM(t.rows_deleted) AS TotalRowsDeleted FROM TABLE(MON_GET_TABLE('{0}', '{1}', -2)) AS t LEFT JOIN SYSCAT.TABLES s ON t.tabschema = s.tabschema AND t.tabname = s.tabname {2} GROUP BY t.tabschema, t.tabname, s.tbspace ORDER BY TotalRowsRead DESC
GetDatabaseLoadMonitor.description: Get database load metrics with tablespace info for the Database Load Monitor panel. Uses MON_GET_TABLE monitoring function joined with SYSCAT.TABLES to include tablespace. Placeholders: {0}=schema filter (empty for all), {1}=table filter (empty for all), {2}=WHERE clause for system schema exclusion. Column aliases use database-agnostic PascalCase naming.
GetDatabaseLoadMonitor.returns: Table activity metrics with tablespace, grouped by table

GetDatabaseLoadMonitor_SystemSchemaExclu.description: WHERE clause fragment for excluding system schemas from the Database Load Monitor. Used with GetDatabaseLoadMonitor statement.

GetTableStatistics_BySchema.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, CARD, NPAGES, FPAGES, STATS_TIME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'U') ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetTableStatistics_BySchema.description: Get table statistics for all tables in a schema pattern. Returns row count (CARD), data pages, free pages, and last stats update time. Schema filter supports wildcards. TRIM() applied. Used by CLI command 'table-stats'.
GetTableStatistics_BySchema.returns: Table statistics with cardinality and page info

GetTableDependencies_Outgoing.sql: SELECT TRIM(BSCHEMA) AS BSCHEMA, TRIM(BNAME) AS BNAME, BTYPE, DTYPE FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY BSCHEMA, BNAME
GetTableDependencies_Outgoing.description: Get outgoing object dependencies (objects that this table/view depends on). Returns target schema, object name, type, and dependency type from SYSCAT.TABDEP. TRIM() applied. Used by CLI command 'dependencies'.
GetTableDependencies_Outgoing.returns: List of dependencies with target objects

GetCdcInfo.sql: SELECT TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, PROPERTY FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'U') AND PROPERTY IS NOT NULL ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
GetCdcInfo.description: Get Change Data Capture (CDC) information for tables. Returns tables with PROPERTY column populated (CDC-enabled tables). Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'cdc-info'.
GetCdcInfo.returns: List of CDC-enabled tables with properties

ListViews.sql: SELECT TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) AS VIEWSCHEMA, TRIM(VIEWNAME) AS VIEWNAME, TRIM(VALID) AS VALID, TRIM(READONLY) AS READONLY FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) LIKE ? ORDER BY VIEWSCHEMA, VIEWNAME
ListViews.description: List all views in schema(s). SYSCAT.VIEWS does NOT have REMARKS column. Returns view schema, name, valid flag, and read-only flag. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'list-views'.

ListProcedures.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS ROUTINESCHEMA, TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, PARM_COUNT AS ParameterCount FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) LIKE ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P' ORDER BY ROUTINESCHEMA, ROUTINENAME
ListProcedures.description: List all stored procedures in schema(s). Uses SYSCAT.ROUTINES (not SYSCAT.PROCEDURES which doesn't exist). Returns procedure schema, name, language, and parameter count. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'list-procedures'.

ListTriggers.sql: SELECT TRIGSCHEMA, TRIGNAME, TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, TRIGTIME, TRIGEVENT, ENABLED FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIGSCHEMA LIKE ? ORDER BY TRIGSCHEMA, TRIGNAME
ListTriggers.description: List all triggers in schema(s). Returns trigger schema, name, target table, timing (BEFORE/AFTER), event (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE), and enabled flag. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'list-triggers'.

ListFunctions.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS ROUTINESCHEMA, TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, PARM_COUNT AS ParameterCount FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) LIKE ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F' ORDER BY ROUTINESCHEMA, ROUTINENAME
ListFunctions.description: List all user-defined functions in schema(s). Uses SYSCAT.ROUTINES (not SYSCAT.FUNCTIONS which doesn't exist). Returns function schema, name, language, and parameter count. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'list-functions'.

ListPackages.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) AS PackageSchema, TRIM(PKGNAME) AS PackageName, CREATE_TIME, LAST_BIND_TIME FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE PKGSCHEMA LIKE ? ORDER BY PackageSchema, PackageName
ListPackages.description: List all packages in schema(s). Returns package schema, name, create time, and last bind time. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'list-packages'.

ListTablespaces.sql: SELECT TRIM(TBSPACE) AS TablespaceName, TRIM(OWNER) AS Owner, TRIM(TBSPACETYPE) AS Type, TRIM(DATATYPE) AS DataType, PAGESIZE FROM SYSCAT.TABLESPACES ORDER BY TablespaceName
ListTablespaces.description: List all tablespaces. Returns tablespace name, owner, type (SMS/DMS), data type, and page size. Used by CLI command 'list-tablespaces'.

GetObjectComment.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(TABNAME) AS Name, COALESCE(TRIM(REMARKS), '') AS Comment FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ?
GetObjectComment.description: Get comment/remarks for a specific table. Returns schema, name, and comment text. Used by CLI command 'object-comment'.

FindMissingComments.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(TABNAME) AS Name, TRIM(TYPE) AS TableType FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'U') AND (REMARKS IS NULL OR TRIM(REMARKS) = '') ORDER BY Schema, Name
FindMissingComments.description: Find tables without comments. Returns tables where REMARKS column is null or empty. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'missing-comments'.

FindUnusedTables.sql: SELECT TRIM(T.TABSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(T.TABNAME) AS TableName, T.CARD AS RowCount, T.CREATE_TIME AS CreateTime, CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP D WHERE D.BSCHEMA = T.TABSCHEMA AND D.BNAME = T.TABNAME) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NoDependencies FROM SYSCAT.TABLES T WHERE T.TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND T.TYPE IN ('T', 'U') ORDER BY T.TABSCHEMA, T.TABNAME
FindUnusedTables.description: Find potentially unused tables (tables with no dependencies in SYSCAT.TABDEP). Returns tables that no other objects depend on. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'find-unused-tables'.
FindUnusedTables.returns: List of potentially unused tables with metadata

SearchSourceCode.sql: SELECT 'PROCEDURE' AS ObjectType, TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS Name, TEXT AS SourceCode FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P' AND UPPER(TEXT) LIKE UPPER(?) UNION ALL SELECT 'FUNCTION' AS ObjectType, TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS Name, TEXT AS SourceCode FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F' AND UPPER(TEXT) LIKE UPPER(?) UNION ALL SELECT 'VIEW' AS ObjectType, TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(VIEWNAME) AS Name, TEXT AS SourceCode FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE VIEWSCHEMA = ? AND UPPER(TEXT) LIKE UPPER(?) UNION ALL SELECT 'TRIGGER' AS ObjectType, TRIM(TRIGSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(TRIGNAME) AS Name, TEXT AS SourceCode FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIGSCHEMA = ? AND UPPER(TEXT) LIKE UPPER(?) ORDER BY ObjectType, Schema, Name
SearchSourceCode.description: Search source code across procedures, functions, views, and triggers for a text pattern. Uses UPPER and LIKE for case-insensitive search. Returns object type, schema, name, and source code. Used by CLI command 'source-search'.
SearchSourceCode.returns: List of objects containing search text with source code

GetIndexStatistics.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME) AS IndexName, TRIM(INDEXTYPE) AS IndexType, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UniqueRule, COLCOUNT AS ColumnCount, FIRSTKEYCARD AS FirstKeyCard, FULLKEYCARD AS FullKeyCard, CLUSTERRATIO AS ClusterRatio, NLEAF AS LeafPages, NLEVELS AS TreeLevels FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetIndexStatistics.description: Get detailed index statistics for a table including cardinality metrics, cluster ratio, and tree structure. Used by CLI command 'index-statistics'.
GetIndexStatistics.returns: List of indexes with detailed statistics

FindUnusedIndexes.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TableName, TRIM(INDNAME) AS IndexName, TRIM(UNIQUERULE) AS UniqueRule, COLNAMES FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND UNIQUERULE NOT IN ('P') ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, INDNAME
FindUnusedIndexes.description: Find potentially unused indexes (excludes primary key indexes). Returns non-PK indexes that may not be used. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'find-unused-indexes'.

FindUnusedViews.sql: SELECT TRIM(V.VIEWSCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) AS ViewName, TRIM(V.VALID) AS Valid, CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP D WHERE D.BSCHEMA = V.VIEWSCHEMA AND D.BNAME = V.VIEWNAME) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NoDependencies FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS V WHERE V.VIEWSCHEMA LIKE ? ORDER BY V.VIEWSCHEMA, V.VIEWNAME
FindUnusedViews.description: Find potentially unused views (views with no dependencies). Returns views that no other objects depend on. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'find-unused-views'.

FindUnusedRoutines.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.ROUTINESCHEMA) AS Schema, TRIM(R.ROUTINENAME) AS RoutineName, TRIM(R.ROUTINETYPE) AS RoutineType, TRIM(R.LANGUAGE) AS Language, R.CREATE_TIME AS CreateTime, CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEDEP D WHERE D.BSCHEMA = R.ROUTINESCHEMA AND D.BNAME = R.ROUTINENAME) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NoDependencies FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES R WHERE R.ROUTINESCHEMA LIKE ? ORDER BY R.ROUTINESCHEMA, R.ROUTINENAME
FindUnusedRoutines.description: Find potentially unused routines (procedures/functions with no dependencies). Returns routines that no other objects depend on. Schema filter supports wildcards. Used by CLI command 'find-unused-routines'.

ListTables.sql: SELECT TABSCHEMA, TABNAME, TYPE, CARD, NPAGES, FPAGES, STATUS, REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA LIKE ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'U') ORDER BY TABSCHEMA, TABNAME
ListTables.description: List all tables in a schema. Returns table metadata including row counts and storage info. Schema filter supports wildcards (%). Used by CLI command 'list-tables'.

GetUserAccessLevel.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME, DBADMAUTH, SECURITYADMAUTH AS SECADMAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ?
GetUserAccessLevel.description: Get user's database access level from SYSCAT.DBAUTH. Used for RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) to determine if user has DBA or SECADM privileges.

GetTableComment.sql: SELECT REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ?
GetTableComment.description: Get table comment/description from SYSCAT.TABLES.REMARKS for AI deep analysis.

GetColumnComments.sql: SELECT COLNAME, REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND REMARKS IS NOT NULL AND REMARKS <> '' ORDER BY COLNO
GetColumnComments.description: Get all column comments from SYSCAT.COLUMNS for AI context building.

GetColumnMetadata.sql: SELECT COLNAME, TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, NULLS, IDENTITY, DEFAULT FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetColumnMetadata.description: Get complete column metadata including data types, nullable, identity, and defaults for AI analysis.

GetTableRelationships.sql: SELECT R.CONSTNAME, R.TABSCHEMA, R.TABNAME, R.REFTABSCHEMA, R.REFTABNAME, K.COLNAME, K.COLSEQ FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE K ON R.CONSTNAME = K.CONSTNAME AND R.TABSCHEMA = K.TABSCHEMA AND R.TABNAME = K.TABNAME WHERE (R.TABSCHEMA = ? AND R.TABNAME = ?) OR (R.REFTABSCHEMA = ? AND R.REFTABNAME = ?) ORDER BY R.CONSTNAME, K.COLSEQ
GetTableRelationships.description: Get foreign key relationships for a table (both incoming and outgoing) for AI context and ERD generation.

GetViewDefinition_AI.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewDefinition_AI.description: Get view SQL definition for AI context building. TRIM() applied.

GetViewColumns.sql: SELECT COLNAME, TYPENAME, LENGTH, NULLS FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetViewColumns.description: Get columns for a view (views are also in SYSCAT.COLUMNS).

GetViewDependencies_TablesOnly.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(BSCHEMA) || '.' || TRIM(BNAME) AS DEPENDENCY FROM SYSCAT.VIEWDEP WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(VIEWNAME) = ? AND BTYPE = 'T' ORDER BY DEPENDENCY
GetViewDependencies_TablesOnly.description: Get tables used by a view for dependency analysis. Filters to BTYPE='T' (tables only). TRIM() applied.

GetProcedureMetadata.sql: SELECT LANGUAGE, DETERMINISTIC, SQL_DATA_ACCESS, REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.PROCEDURES WHERE PROCSCHEMA = ? AND PROCNAME = ? FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
GetProcedureMetadata.description: Get procedure metadata for AI context.

GetProcedureParameters.sql: SELECT PARMNAME, TYPENAME, PARM_MODE, REMARKS, ORDINAL FROM SYSCAT.PROCPARMS WHERE PROCSCHEMA = ? AND PROCNAME = ? ORDER BY ORDINAL
GetProcedureParameters.description: Get procedure parameters (IN, OUT, INOUT) for AI context.

GetProcedureSource.sql: SELECT TEXT FROM SYSCAT.PROCEDURES WHERE PROCSCHEMA = ? AND PROCNAME = ?
GetProcedureSource.description: Get procedure source code for AI analysis.

GetProcedureDependencies.sql: SELECT DISTINCT BSCHEMA || '.' || BNAME || ' (' || BTYPE || ')' as DEPENDENCY FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEDEP WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINENAME = ? ORDER BY DEPENDENCY
GetProcedureDependencies.description: Get objects used by a procedure.

GetFunctionMetadata.sql: SELECT RETURN_TYPE, LANGUAGE, DETERMINISTIC, SQL_DATA_ACCESS, REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.FUNCTIONS WHERE FUNCSCHEMA = ? AND FUNCNAME = ? FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
GetFunctionMetadata.description: Get function metadata for AI context.

GetFunctionParameters.sql: SELECT PARMNAME, TYPENAME, PARM_MODE, ORDINAL FROM SYSCAT.FUNCPARMS WHERE FUNCSCHEMA = ? AND FUNCNAME = ? ORDER BY ORDINAL
GetFunctionParameters.description: Get function parameters for AI context.

GetFunctionSource.sql: SELECT TEXT FROM SYSCAT.FUNCTIONS WHERE FUNCSCHEMA = ? AND FUNCNAME = ?
GetFunctionSource.description: Get function source code for AI analysis.

GetPackageMetadata.sql: SELECT PKGTYPE, ISOLATION, CREATE_TIME, LAST_BIND_TIME FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE PKGSCHEMA = ? AND PKGNAME = ? FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
GetPackageMetadata.description: Get package metadata for AI context.

GetPackageStatements_AI.sql: SELECT TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY STMTNO
GetPackageStatements_AI.description: Get all SQL statements in a package for AI analysis. Fixed: STMTTEXTTEXT, added TRIM().

GetViewInfo_Full.sql: SELECT TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) AS VIEWSCHEMA, TRIM(VIEWNAME) AS VIEWNAME, TRIM(DEFINER) AS DEFINER, TRIM(VALID) AS VALID, TRIM(READONLY) AS READONLY, TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(VIEWNAME) = ?
GetViewInfo_Full.description: Get full view metadata including SQL text. Used by CLI command 'ai-explain-view'.

GetPackageInfo_Full.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) AS PKGSCHEMA, TRIM(PKGNAME) AS PKGNAME, TRIM(BOUNDBY) AS BOUNDBY, TRIM(VALID) AS VALID, TRIM(UNIQUE_ID) AS UNIQUE_ID, TRIM(ISOLATION) AS ISOLATION, TRIM(SQLWARN) AS SQLWARN, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME, LAST_BIND_TIME FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ?
GetPackageInfo_Full.description: Get full package metadata. Used by CLI command 'ai-analyze-package'.

CompareSourceOnlyTables.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? EXCEPT SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ?
CompareSourceOnlyTables.description: Find tables that exist only in source schema (not in target). Used by CLI command 'db-compare-source-only'.

CompareTargetOnlyTables.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? EXCEPT SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ?
CompareTargetOnlyTables.description: Find tables that exist only in target schema (not in source). Used by CLI command 'db-compare-target-only'.

CompareCommonTables.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(t1.TABNAME) AS TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES t1 INNER JOIN SYSCAT.TABLES t2 ON TRIM(t1.TABNAME) = TRIM(t2.TABNAME) WHERE TRIM(t1.TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(t2.TABSCHEMA) = ?
CompareCommonTables.description: Find tables that exist in both schemas (for structural comparison). Used by CLI command 'db-compare-different'.

GetViewColumns_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLNAME, COLNO, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, TRIM(NULLS) AS NULLS, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetViewColumns_CLI.description: Get view columns for CLI output. Uses TABSCHEMA/TABNAME to access view columns. Used by CLI command 'view-columns'.

GetViewDependencies_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(BTYPE) AS DEPENDENCY_TYPE, TRIM(BSCHEMA) AS BSCHEMA, TRIM(BNAME) AS BNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABDEP WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?
GetViewDependencies_CLI.description: Get view dependencies (tables/views it depends on). Uses SYSCAT.TABDEP. Used by CLI command 'view-dependencies'.

GetRoutineParameters_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(PARMNAME) AS PARMNAME, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS TYPENAME, LENGTH, SCALE, TRIM(ROWTYPE) AS ROWTYPE, ORDINAL FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEPARMS WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(ROUTINENAME) = ? ORDER BY ORDINAL
GetRoutineParameters_CLI.description: Get routine (procedure/function) parameters. Uses SYSCAT.ROUTINEPARMS. Used by CLI commands 'procedure-parameters' and 'function-parameters'.

GetPackageProperties_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) AS PKGSCHEMA, TRIM(PKGNAME) AS PKGNAME, TRIM(BOUNDBY) AS BOUNDBY, TRIM(VALID) AS VALID, TRIM(UNIQUE_ID) AS UNIQUE_ID, TRIM(ISOLATION) AS ISOLATION, TRIM(SQLWARN) AS SQLWARN, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, CREATE_TIME FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ?
GetPackageProperties_CLI.description: Get package properties for CLI output. Used by CLI command 'package-properties'.

GetPackageStatements_CLI.sql: SELECT STMTNO, SECTNO, SEQNO, TRIM(TEXT) AS TEXT FROM SYSCAT.STATEMENTS WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(PKGNAME) = ? ORDER BY STMTNO, SEQNO
GetPackageStatements_CLI.description: Get package SQL statements for CLI output. Uses SYSCAT.STATEMENTS. Used by CLI command 'package-statements'.

GetTableRelationships_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(REFTABSCHEMA) AS REFTABSCHEMA, TRIM(REFTABNAME) AS REFTABNAME FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES WHERE (TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?) OR (TRIM(REFTABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(REFTABNAME) = ?)
GetTableRelationships_CLI.description: Get table relationships (both incoming and outgoing foreign keys). Used by CLI command 'table-relationships'.

GetUserProperties_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GRANTEE, TRIM(GRANTEETYPE) AS GRANTEETYPE, DBADMAUTH, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH, CONNECTAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ?
GetUserProperties_CLI.description: Get user database authorities. Used by CLI command 'user-properties'.

GetUserPrivileges_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GRANTEE, TRIM(GRANTOR) AS GRANTOR, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, SELECTAUTH, INSERTAUTH, UPDATEAUTH, DELETEAUTH FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE TRIM(GRANTEE) = ?
GetUserPrivileges_CLI.description: Get user table privileges. Used by CLI command 'user-privileges'.

GetObjectMetadata_CLI.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TRIM(TYPE) AS TYPE, TRIM(STATUS) AS STATUS, COLCOUNT, NPAGES, FPAGES, CARD, STATS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, ALTER_TIME, INVALIDATE_TIME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TRIM(TABNAME) = ?
GetObjectMetadata_CLI.description: Get generic object metadata from SYSCAT.TABLES. Used by CLI command 'object-metadata'.

GetCurrentUserAccessLevel.sql: SELECT DBADMAUTH, SECURITYADMAUTH, DATAACCESSAUTH, CREATETABAUTH, BINDADDAUTH FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = CURRENT USER AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
GetCurrentUserAccessLevel.description: Get current user's database authorities to determine access level (DBA/Advanced/Standard). Uses CURRENT USER instead of parameter.

GetAliasCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TYPE = 'A'
GetAliasCount.description: Count total number of aliases in the database.

GetSecurityObjectCount.sql: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROLES) + (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GRANTEE) FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'G') + (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GRANTEE) FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'U') FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
GetSecurityObjectCount.description: Count total security objects (roles + groups + users).

GetTablesCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'S', 'G', 'H', 'L', 'N', 'U', 'W')
GetTablesCountForSchema.description: Count tables in a specific schema.

GetViewsCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.VIEWS WHERE TRIM(VIEWSCHEMA) = ?
GetViewsCountForSchema.description: Count views in a specific schema.
