GetProceduresCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P'
GetProceduresCountForSchema.description: Count procedures in a specific schema.

GetFunctionsCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F'
GetFunctionsCountForSchema.description: Count functions in a specific schema.

GetIndexesCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ?
GetIndexesCountForSchema.description: Count indexes in a specific schema.

GetTriggersCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIM(TRIGSCHEMA) = ?
GetTriggersCountForSchema.description: Count triggers in a specific schema.

GetSequencesCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) = ?
GetSequencesCountForSchema.description: Count sequences in a specific schema.

GetSynonymsCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'A'
GetSynonymsCountForSchema.description: Count synonyms (aliases) in a specific schema.

GetTypesCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.DATATYPES WHERE TRIM(TYPESCHEMA) = ? AND METATYPE IN ('A', 'D', 'R', 'S')
GetTypesCountForSchema.description: Count user-defined types in a specific schema.

GetPackagesCountForSchema.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ?
GetPackagesCountForSchema.description: Count packages in a specific schema.

GetTablesForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME), TRIM(TYPE), TRIM(OWNER), CARD AS ROW_COUNT, TRIM(TBSPACE), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE IN ('T', 'S', 'G', 'H', 'L', 'N', 'U', 'W') ORDER BY TABNAME
GetTablesForSchemaFull.description: Get all tables in a schema with full details including TYPE and TBSPACE.
GetTablesForSchemaFull.returns: List of tables with full metadata

GetViewsForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(V.VIEWNAME) AS VIEWNAME, TRIM(T.DEFINER) AS OWNER, TRIM(T.REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.TABLES T JOIN SYSCAT.VIEWS V ON T.TABSCHEMA = V.VIEWSCHEMA AND T.TABNAME = V.VIEWNAME WHERE T.TYPE = 'V' AND T.TABSCHEMA = ? ORDER BY V.VIEWNAME
GetViewsForSchemaFull.description: Get all views in a schema with owner and remarks.

GetProceduresForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME), TRIM(SPECIFICNAME), TRIM(LANGUAGE), PARM_COUNT, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(OWNER), TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE TRIM(ROUTINESCHEMA) = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'P' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetProceduresForSchemaFull.description: Get all procedures in a schema with full details.
GetProceduresForSchemaFull.returns: List of procedures with full metadata

GetFunctionsForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROUTINENAME) AS ROUTINENAME, TRIM(SPECIFICNAME) AS SPECIFICNAME, TRIM(LANGUAGE) AS LANGUAGE, PARM_COUNT, TRIM(FUNCTIONTYPE) AS FUNCTIONTYPE, CREATE_TIME, TRIM(OWNER) AS OWNER, TRIM(REMARKS) AS REMARKS FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINES WHERE ROUTINESCHEMA = ? AND ROUTINETYPE = 'F' ORDER BY ROUTINENAME
GetFunctionsForSchemaFull.description: Get all functions in a schema with full details including FUNCTIONTYPE.
GetFunctionsForSchemaFull.returns: List of functions with full metadata

GetTablespacesWithRemarks.sql: SELECT TRIM(TBSPACE), TRIM(TBSPACETYPE), TRIM(DATATYPE), PAGESIZE, TRIM(OWNER), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.TABLESPACES ORDER BY TBSPACE
GetTablespacesWithRemarks.description: Get all tablespaces with full details including REMARKS.
GetTablespacesWithRemarks.returns: List of tablespaces with full metadata

GetRolesWithRemarks.sql: SELECT TRIM(ROLENAME), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.ROLES ORDER BY ROLENAME
GetRolesWithRemarks.description: Get all roles with creation time and remarks.

GetGroupsUnion.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GROUPNAME FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'G' UNION SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS GROUPNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'G' ORDER BY GROUPNAME
GetGroupsUnion.description: Get all groups from DBAUTH and TABAUTH combined.

GetUsersUnion.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME FROM SYSCAT.DBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'U' UNION SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(GRANTEE) AS USERNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = 'U' ORDER BY USERNAME
GetUsersUnion.description: Get all users from DBAUTH and TABAUTH combined.

GetRoleAuthCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROLEAUTH WHERE TRIM(ROLENAME) = ?
GetRoleAuthCount.description: Count users who have a specific role.

GetGroupTablePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupTablePrivCount.description: Count table privileges for a group.

GetGroupRoutinePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupRoutinePrivCount.description: Count routine privileges for a group.

GetGroupSchemaPrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SCHEMAAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupSchemaPrivCount.description: Count schema privileges for a group.

GetGroupSequencePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'G'
GetGroupSequencePrivCount.description: Count sequence privileges for a group.

GetUserTablePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TABAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserTablePrivCount.description: Count table privileges for a user.

GetUserColumnPrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.COLAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserColumnPrivCount.description: Count column privileges for a user.

GetUserRoutinePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.ROUTINEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserRoutinePrivCount.description: Count routine privileges for a user.

GetUserSchemaPrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SCHEMAAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserSchemaPrivCount.description: Count schema privileges for a user.

GetUserSequencePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserSequencePrivCount.description: Count sequence privileges for a user.

GetUserTablespacePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.TBSPACEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserTablespacePrivCount.description: Count tablespace privileges for a user.

GetUserPackagePrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGEAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserPackagePrivCount.description: Count package privileges for a user.

GetUserIndexPrivCount.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYSCAT.INDEXAUTH WHERE GRANTEE = ? AND GRANTEETYPE = 'U'
GetUserIndexPrivCount.description: Count index privileges for a user.

GetIndexesForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDNAME), TRIM(TABSCHEMA), TRIM(TABNAME), TRIM(UNIQUERULE), TRIM(INDEXTYPE), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(OWNER), TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY INDNAME
GetIndexesForSchemaFull.description: Get all indexes in a schema with full details.
GetIndexesForSchemaFull.returns: List of indexes with full metadata

GetTriggersForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(TRIGNAME), TRIM(TABSCHEMA), TRIM(TABNAME), TRIM(TRIGEVENT), TRIM(TRIGTIME), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(OWNER), TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.TRIGGERS WHERE TRIM(TRIGSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY TRIGNAME
GetTriggersForSchemaFull.description: Get all triggers in a schema with full details.
GetTriggersForSchemaFull.returns: List of triggers with full metadata

GetSequencesForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(SEQNAME), TRIM(SEQTYPE), START, INCREMENT, TRIM(OWNER), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY SEQNAME
GetSequencesForSchemaFull.description: Get all sequences in a schema with full details.
GetSequencesForSchemaFull.returns: List of sequences with full metadata

GetSynonymsForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(TABNAME) AS ALIAS_NAME, TRIM(BASE_TABSCHEMA), TRIM(BASE_TABNAME), TRIM(OWNER), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.TABLES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) = ? AND TYPE = 'A' ORDER BY TABNAME
GetSynonymsForSchemaFull.description: Get all synonyms in a schema with full details.
GetSynonymsForSchemaFull.returns: List of synonyms with full metadata

GetTypesForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(TYPENAME), TRIM(METATYPE), TRIM(OWNER), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.DATATYPES WHERE TRIM(TYPESCHEMA) = ? AND METATYPE IN ('A', 'D', 'R', 'S') ORDER BY TYPENAME
GetTypesForSchemaFull.description: Get all user-defined types in a schema with full details.
GetTypesForSchemaFull.returns: List of UDTs with full metadata

GetPackagesAll.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGSCHEMA), TRIM(PKGNAME), TRIM(BOUNDBY), TRIM(OWNER), TRIM(ISOLATION), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES ORDER BY PKGSCHEMA, PKGNAME
GetPackagesAll.description: Get all packages in the database with full details.
GetPackagesAll.returns: List of all packages with metadata

GetPackagesForSchemaFull.sql: SELECT TRIM(PKGNAME), TRIM(BOUNDBY), TRIM(OWNER), TRIM(ISOLATION), CREATE_TIME, TRIM(REMARKS) FROM SYSCAT.PACKAGES WHERE TRIM(PKGSCHEMA) = ? ORDER BY PKGNAME
GetPackagesForSchemaFull.description: Get all packages in a schema with full details.
GetPackagesForSchemaFull.returns: List of packages in schema with metadata

ListAllIndexes.sql: SELECT TRIM(INDSCHEMA) AS INDSCHEMA, TRIM(INDNAME) AS INDNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, UNIQUERULE, PCTFREE, NLEAF, NLEVELS, CLUSTERRATIO FROM SYSCAT.INDEXES WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) LIKE ? ORDER BY INDNAME FETCH FIRST 200 ROWS ONLY
ListAllIndexes.description: List all indexes in a schema with details.

ListConstraints.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTNAME, TRIM(TABSCHEMA) AS TABSCHEMA, TRIM(TABNAME) AS TABNAME, TYPE, ENFORCED FROM SYSCAT.TABCONST WHERE TRIM(TABSCHEMA) LIKE ? ORDER BY CONSTNAME FETCH FIRST 200 ROWS ONLY
ListConstraints.description: List all constraints in a schema.

ListSequences.sql: SELECT TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) AS SEQSCHEMA, TRIM(SEQNAME) AS SEQNAME, SEQTYPE, START, INCREMENT, MINVALUE, MAXVALUE, CYCLE, CACHE FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE TRIM(SEQSCHEMA) LIKE ? ORDER BY SEQNAME FETCH FIRST 200 ROWS ONLY
ListSequences.description: List all sequences in a schema.

GetDbConfig.sql: SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM SYSIBMADM.DBCFG ORDER BY NAME FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY

TestConnection.description: Simple query to test database connectivity.
TestConnection.returns: Single row if connection is successful

GetTableColumnsForMissingFK.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLUMN_NAME, TRIM(TYPENAME) AS DATA_TYPE, LENGTH, SCALE, CASE WHEN NULLS = 'Y' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS IS_NULLABLE FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? ORDER BY COLNO
GetTableColumnsForMissingFK.description: Get columns for missing FK analysis using DB2 SYSCAT.COLUMNS. Returns column name, data type, length, scale, and nullability.
GetTableColumnsForMissingFK.returns: List of columns with type info for FK candidate matching

GetTablePrimaryKey.sql: SELECT TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLUMN_NAME FROM SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND CONSTNAME IN (SELECT CONSTNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABCONST WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND TYPE = 'P') ORDER BY COLSEQ
GetTablePrimaryKey.description: Get primary key columns using DB2 SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE and SYSCAT.TABCONST. Returns column names that are part of the primary key constraint.
GetTablePrimaryKey.returns: List of primary key column names

GetTableUniqueKeys.sql: SELECT TRIM(CONSTNAME) AS CONSTRAINT_NAME, TRIM(COLNAME) AS COLUMN_NAME FROM SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND CONSTNAME IN (SELECT CONSTNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABCONST WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND TYPE = 'U') ORDER BY CONSTNAME, COLSEQ
GetTableUniqueKeys.description: Get unique key constraints using DB2 SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE and SYSCAT.TABCONST. Returns constraint name and column names for each unique constraint.
GetTableUniqueKeys.returns: List of unique constraints with their columns

GetTableForeignKeysForMissingFK.sql: SELECT TRIM(R.CONSTNAME) AS CONSTRAINT_NAME, TRIM(K.COLNAME) AS COLUMN_NAME, TRIM(R.REFTABSCHEMA) AS REF_SCHEMA, TRIM(R.REFTABNAME) AS REF_TABLE, TRIM(RK.COLNAME) AS REF_COLUMN FROM SYSCAT.REFERENCES R JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE K ON R.CONSTNAME = K.CONSTNAME AND R.TABSCHEMA = K.TABSCHEMA AND R.TABNAME = K.TABNAME JOIN SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE RK ON R.REFKEYNAME = RK.CONSTNAME AND R.REFTABSCHEMA = RK.TABSCHEMA AND R.REFTABNAME = RK.TABNAME AND K.COLSEQ = RK.COLSEQ WHERE R.TABSCHEMA = ? AND R.TABNAME = ? ORDER BY R.CONSTNAME, K.COLSEQ
GetTableForeignKeysForMissingFK.description: Get foreign key constraints for missing FK analysis using DB2 SYSCAT.REFERENCES and SYSCAT.KEYCOLUSE. Returns constraint name, column names, and referenced table/column information.
GetTableForeignKeysForMissingFK.returns: List of foreign keys with full reference details

GetTableRowCount.description: Get row count for table. Schema and table names are inserted at runtime (not parameterized due to identifier requirements).
GetTableRowCount.note: This query uses {SCHEMA} and {TABLE} placeholders that must be replaced with actual identifiers at runtime.

GetTableDataForExport.description: Get all data from table for CSV export or FK value sampling. Schema and table names are inserted at runtime.
GetTableDataForExport.note: This query uses {SCHEMA} and {TABLE} placeholders that must be replaced with actual identifiers at runtime.
